title: Goyard Mini Saigon Souple Bag
description: Goyard mini Saigon Souple bag in blue Goyardine coated canvas and blue leather. Featuring silver-toned hardware & a wooden top handle. The fold-over leather top flap with fold-in flap closure opens to a yellow leather interior with a patch pocket. Approx. dimensions: 20.5cm(Base-L) x 16cm(H) x 8cm(D). Handle drop 7cm, removable & adjustable leather shoulder strap drop 56.5cm. Accompanied by a Goyard mini dustbag. With Entrupy Certificate of Authenticity. (Pre-owned)
